DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess impact three different treatment modality panic symptom , quality life use health service among individual consult emergency department non cardiac chest pain Panic Disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Panic Disorder Among Individuals Consulting Emergency Departments Non Cardiac Chest Pain
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 Mastered oral write French Consulted emergency department chest pain low risk coronary disease ( normal ECG blood test ) Met criterion Panic Disorder Chest pain obvious medical origin ( obvious trauma abnormal pulmonary xrays ) Had receive cognitivebehavior therapy Panic Disorder last six month Cognitive impairment prevent completion psychological assessment Past present psychotic episode , Bipolar Disorder , organic mental disorder Current Abuse Dependence Disorder If another Mental Disorder present , severity equal inferior severity Panic Disorder Current medical condition prevent participant receive pharmacological cognitivebehavior treatment
